def_cn: （加在表示国家、民族的形容词之前构成新的形容词）表示“英国的”，“英国和…的”
def_en: Anglo- combines with adjectives indicating nationality to form adjectives which describe something connected with relations between Britain and another country.

def_cn: （加在表示国家、民族的形容词之前构成新的形容词）表示“英裔的”
def_en: Anglo- combines with adjectives indicating nationality to form adjectives which describe a person who has one British parent and one non-British parent.
